# vue/arrow-spacing

üö´ This rule is *disabled* in the `no-layout-rules` [config](https://eslint.vuejs.org/user-guide/#bundle-configurations).

üîß This rule is automatically fixable by the [`--fix` CLI option](https://eslint.org/docs/latest/user-guide/command-line-interface#--fix).

<!-- end auto-generated rule header -->

> Enforce consistent spacing before and after the arrow in arrow functions in `<template>`

This rule is the same rule as core [arrow-spacing] rule but it applies to the expressions in `<template>`.

## :books: Further Reading

- [arrow-spacing]

[arrow-spacing]: https://eslint.org/docs/rules/arrow-spacing

## :rocket: Version

This rule was introduced in eslint-plugin-vue v5.2.0
